What the simplest way of making a 2 input 1 output NN in Flux.jl? Bonus points if done with Chain.
```function model(X1, X2)
    NN_1 = Dense(10, 10)(X1)
    NN_2 = Dense(10, 10)(X2)

    Chain(cat(NN_1, NN_2), Dense(20, 10), softmax)
end```
